titleInfo.title: Ed Green standing in Green's Dry Goods Store, Antonito, Colo.

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On back of photograph: #969 Green Store Antonito, Co c. 1915''. On envelope: ''#969 Edward Green Store Antonito, Co., c. 1915''.

mods.abstract: Ed Green stands at the right of the store wearing a hat and three-piece suit. One customer and four salesman pose in front of the counters and stacks of dry goods. Green's Dry Goods Store was located in Antonito, Colorado.
mods.note: Appears in, ''Images of America: Jewish Denver 1859-1940,'' By Dr. Jeanne Abrams on page 113.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
